sentences.sContent: In codicil, keep your plans somewhat flexible so that you can change ships at the last minute.
sentences.sContent_eng: In codicil, keep your plans somewhat flexible so that you can change ships at the last minute.
sentences.sCn: 在遗嘱，让您的计划一定灵活性，以便您可以更改船舶在最后一分钟。

trans.tranOther: a document making a change or addition to a  will (= a legal document saying who you want your money and property to go to when you die )
